Iron.note: ⟨э⟩ is used only in recent Russian loanwords.

Digor.note: Only when ⟨б⟩ is in the last position.
Only when ⟨д⟩ is in the last position.
Only when ⟨г⟩ is in the last position.
Only when ⟨в⟩ is in the last position.

Iron.note: Corresponds to /s/ in Chisan and Kudar speech.
⟨ш⟩ is used only in recent Russian loanwords.
Corresponds to /z/ in Chisan and Kudar speech.
⟨ж⟩ is used only in recent Russian loanwords.

Digor.note: Only when ⟨гъ⟩ is in the last position.

Iron.note: Corresponds to /d͡z/ in Chisan speech, and to /ʒ/ in Kudar speech.

Digor.note: Palatalized into /ʒ/ before /i/, /e/ in Chikola speech.

Iron.note: Occurs only when doubled, corresponds to (doubled) /d͡ʒ/ in Kudar speech.

Digor.note: Palatalized into /d͡ʒ/ before /i/, /e/ in Chikola speech.

Iron.note: Corresponds to /t͡s/ in Chisan speech, and to /ʃ/ in Kudar speech.

Digor.note: Palatalized into /ʃ/ before /i/, /e/ in Chikola speech.
Only when ⟨з⟩ is in the last position.

Iron.note: Occurs only when doubled, corresponds to (doubled) /t͡ʃ/ in Kudar speech.

Digor.note: Palatalized into /t͡ʃ/ before /i/, /e/ in Chikola speech.
Only when ⟨дз⟩ is in the last position.
Palatalized into /t͡ʃʼ/ before /i/, /e/ in Chikola speech.
